hudson.tasks.Shell.command: export GIT_COMMIT=`cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 40 | head -n 1` export GIT_BRANCH='origin/master' # Pick Random committer export RAND=$(($RANDOM % 4)) if [ $RAND -eq 0 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_NAME="Martin Brundell"; export GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL="martin.brundell@observeinc.com"; fi if [ $RAND -eq 1 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_NAME="Damon Hill"; export GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL="damon.hill@observeinc.com"; fi if [ $RAND -eq 2 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_NAME="Nigel Mansell"; export GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL="nigel.mansell@observeinc.com"; fi if [ $RAND -eq 3 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_NAME="Paul di Resta"; export GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL="paul.diresta@observeinc.com"; fi # Pick random commit message export RAND=$(($RANDOM % 4)) if [ $RAND -eq 0 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_SUBJECT='Cache updates'; fi if [ $RAND -eq 1 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_SUBJECT='Removing some dead code'; fi if [ $RAND -eq 2 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_SUBJECT='Updated session timeout'; fi if [ $RAND -eq 3 ] ; then export GIT_COMMIT_SUBJECT='Refactoring connection management'; fi export BUILD_STATUS='SUCCESS' export RAND=$(($RANDOM % 2)) if [ $RAND -eq 1 ] ; then export BUILD_STATUS='FAILED'; fi curl -X POST $PROXY_ENDPOINT/v1/observations/jenkin -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"BUILD_NUMBER":"'$BUILD_NUMBER'","BUILD_ID":"'$BUILD_ID'","JOB_NAME":"'$JOB_NAME'","GIT_COMMIT":"'$GIT_COMMIT'","GIT_BRANCH":"'$GIT_BRANCH'","GIT_COMMITTER_NAME":"'"$GIT_COMMIT_NAME"'","GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL":"'"$GIT_COMMIT_EMAIL"'","GIT_COMMIT_SUBJECT":"'"$GIT_COMMIT_SUBJECT"'","IMAGE":"tombatchelor/car-insurance:6.0","BUILD_STATUS":"'$BUILD_STATUS'"}'
